Articles.Content: Just showing of my aircraft called the AT-700 (aerial transport 700km) kept it simple, it will take of easily just have to throttle up and it has very good yaw and roll stability but I still need to adjust the pitch. To make keep altitude the nose needs to be at 9 or 10 degrees, I want is as close to 0 as possible and since I don\'t really know anything about designing aircraft it will probably take me hours of testing to to that. The way I got that 700km number is from test flying it at full throttle at 15km then gliding to land, it will go about 790km doing this so I just rounded down. If anyone has any good ideas on how to improve this craft i would like to know so I can test it out.
could you post the craft file pretty please with kerbal on top?
Here you go, If you make any improvements let me know.
